mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs_qna (title, userID, viewC, content) VALUES ( #{title}, #{userID}, #{viewC}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, COUNT(B.userID) AS 'likeC' FROM bbs_qna AS A LEFT JOIN like_qna AS B ON A.no = B.no WHERE A.available = 1 GROUP BY A.no
SELECT A.*, COUNT(B.userID) AS 'likeC' FROM bbs_qna AS A LEFT JOIN like_qna AS B ON A.no = B.no WHERE A.no = #{no} GROUP BY A.no
SELECT no FROM bbs_qna WHERE userID = #{userID} ORDER BY no DESC LIMIT 1;
